page.title: 05LEISURE ACTIVITIES.S.HED.
page.content: The{Library}was built in 1965. It opens on Tuesday,Thursday and Saturday. The{Library}books come from Colchester. The Librarian has worked there for 18 years. They have a place for children to sit and read. The{Library}offers special loans of books to the school.The Librarian comes with the{Library}van to help us choose our books. We have a variety of{evening {classes}for children and adults at the Comprehensive School like Gym,Typing, French,Keep-fit,Yoga,Maths,Art and English. There is a{Youth Centre}on Tuesday and Thursday for children over the age of 14 years and on Friday for children from 9 to 14 years. We do different {sports and activities.}
